Giving BFF Goals A Whole New Definition, Sushmita Sen & PC Send Love To Each Other On Instagram
Sushmita Sen and Priyanka Chopra are two glamorous divas that have made the entire nation proud. Winning the titles of Miss Universe (1994) and Miss World (2000), they have inspired millions of women, not only in India, but across the globe. But did you know they are BFFs too?
Remember about two years ago, when the divas met, they made many hearts melt with their camaraderie? These heart-warming pictures will jog your memory.
